item.title: How doyou make mods and admins on testscape?
item.dc:creator: @killa12345 killa12345
item.description:
@killa12345 wrote:

simply search

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase

you should see something like this :

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”)
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]

where i typed- name here - erase that and type in the players name of who you want to be a mod

example :

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("i pked u")) { playerRights = 1; }

save , compile , and run

you probably know this but ill add it anyway

player rights

3=owner
2=mod
1=player mod
0=normal
